article.title: Aerospace and Defense - Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the aerospace and defense industries in Utah.
article.content:
​


The purpose of the Commercial Service is to facilitate the expansion of yourUtah business into the global aerospace and defense marketplace. The Commercial Service has many resources to help you expand your business globally! Weare able to providecurrent market research articles, arrangemeetings with international buyers, and help yourcompany through the exporting process.Thisassistance will allow youto keep ahead of your competitors.

For more information on aerospace and defense or to requestmarket researcharticles regarding aerospace and defense, please contact David Fiscusby phone at (801)255-1873, or via email atdavid.fiscus@trade.gov.

​

article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the aerospace and defense industries in Utah.
